ygData.subject: White Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a cool day with my guild yesterday.  We killed Trakanon in the afternoon, cleared Plane of Sky far enough to finish our first Paladin epic weapon in the
ygData.messageBody:
I had a cool day with my guild yesterday. We killed Trakanon in the
afternoon, cleared Plane of Sky far enough to finish our first Paladin
epic weapon in the early evening, offed Ixlblat Fer twice for some more
Cleric epics, then decided what the heck, let's take a shot at
Talendor. And we got him! Only the second guild on the server to get
him, if I'm not mistaken.

Trak didn't drop the guts (he did the first time we killed him), but now
that I know we can do it, it's just a matter of time. And now that we
know we can kill Talendor, the red scale is within reach (the guild has
one banked for the next person to need it, who will be me or a
warrior). But...

That stinking white scale! If we have to rely on a Vox raid, every
caster and his brother wants to roll for the thing (we don't have enough
twinks to do it ourselves, we have to organize a multi-guild thing).
And he doesn't even drop the thing reliably.

My question for those of you who are hugely uber (hehe) is, then, have
you managed to kill Gorenaire and, if so, are there techniques that
help, or is it just a matter of levels/numbers/weaponry?

My other option is to pay 50-75pp for a White Dragonscale Robe and offer
to trade it to whatever caster wins a Vox lotto for the scale straight
up, but I'm just not that rich.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 56 songs, Innoruuk
